content.text: Egana is a lean man with slicked-back brown hair and a small mustache. He wears a white shirt with a tan collar.
Egana is a very kind man, as he offered to celebrate when Margarita regained her shadow.
Egana is first seen reacting in surprise after Margarita drops some rare plates of his. However, after seeing that she has regained her shadow, he is overjoyed and offers to celebrate.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 50 Chapter 483 and Episode 375, Egana debuts.
↑  One Piece Blue Deep: Characters World (p. 214), His name is revealed.
